name: Six Feet Between US
description:
I watched you grow, my joy and my pride, and as I parted I heard your cries. When the Earth divides us like Mars and Venus, I'll still remember you when there's six feet between us. "Six feet between us" is a 2D narrative game made in PlayDate's Pulp engine. A simple story about a ghost and the world that was left behind.

This is a very short, experimental, poetry game made for the Playdate using Pulp during the Global Game Jam 2022!
developers: Ryan Goward ゴーワド・ライアン
